name: First Freight
tag_list: freight, logistics, crm, customer-relationship-management, software, cloud-based
overview:
First Freight provides the first Customer Relationship Management (CRM) program built exclusively for the Global Freight and Logistics Industry.

First Freight is a SaaS program and business model with a “vertical” approach to CRM. We focus development on the specific needs of international cargo sales organizations - our program offers compelling advantages over generic, “horizontal” CRM programs.

Simple, Affordable, Accessible

First Freight CRM understands the mindset of freight sales professionals and delivers a robust, yet easy-to-use, program that empowers reps and managers and dramatically boosts sales performance.

Like generic, “horizontal” CRM programs, First Freight CRM helps manage Leads, Accounts, Contacts, Activities and Opportunities. Going further, First Freight CRM also accounts for: Consignees, Forwarders, Shippers, Notify Parties, Modes, Service Types, Direction and Trade Lanes.

Based on the high demand and overwhelmingly positive response from freight sales organizations, First Freight CRM aims to become the Global Freight and Logistics Industry Standard in CRM.
